ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup gluten-free all purpose baking flour

cookingTips: Thaw calamari and pat completely dry to prevent oil splattering
Soak calamari in milk for at least 30 minutes before breading for tenderness
Maintain oil at 375°F and fry in quick batches to avoid overcooking
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Teach how milk-soaking tenderizes calamari, the importance of completely dry surfaces before frying, and how to avoid rubbery texture through proper temperature and timing.
